A human T lymphoid cell line , PEER , dies by apoptosis in the presence of PMA and calcium ionophore .
A new gene , <extra_id_0> TINUR <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , was cloned from apoptotic PEER cells .
The expression of the <extra_id_0> TINUR <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene is induced within 1 h after the cross-linking of the T cell Ag receptor complex .
